summary_55_words:
Customer success leader who grows adoption for AI analytics platforms. Pairs
enterprise program management with crisp storytelling that wins executive trust,
steadies renewals, and expands ARR across complex retail portfolios.
tailored_bullets: Scaled an AI insights rollout across 27 retail banners, unlocking 19% more forecast accuracy and $2.3M ARR
Built executive QBR motion with supply-chain focus, reducing churn risk by 14 basis points
Codified adoption playbooks for predictive modeling modules used by 1800+ field leaders
Partnered with solutions engineers to resolve integrations within 48 hours average
Instituted churn-risk dashboard leveraging product telemetry and support tags
Upsold premium analytics add-ons across three global accounts, yielding $1.1M expansion
cover_letter_micro_note:
Thrilled by how Aurora helps retailers trust their demand forecasts. I have
scaled adoption for AI-rich platforms, translating data science breakthroughs into
field-friendly playbooks that lift renewals and expansion. I would love to share
how I helped three $3M+ portfolios grow by double digits last year.

application_qa.question: Describe a time you expanded product adoption.
application_qa.answer: Led a predictive-analytics expansion across a $3.5M portfolio. Built a success plan with workshops, user stories, and KPI dashboards. Expansion delivered $900K ARR while holding churn flat.

application_qa.question: How do you partner with product teams?
application_qa.answer: Run structured feedback sprints. Aggregate quant usage data plus qualitative exec narratives, then co-prioritize fixes. Result: resolved top integration blocker within two releases.

identified_gaps: No direct PMP credential—flag interest in Lean Six Sigma coursework
Limited experience with iPaaS tooling beyond Zapier—line up quick study plan

resume_template_variables.headline: Customer Success Leader | AI Adoption | Retail & Supply Chain
impact_statements: Grew ARR 18% YoY across $3.8M portfolio by launching AI forecast playbooks
Created churn radar blending telemetry + CSAT, cutting surprise churn 40%
Built executive-ready narratives that accelerated upsell cycles by 21 days
